subject: Football (College)
Football
lead_paragraph: Johnny Manziel put on an impressive performance in front of 75 officials from 30 N.F.L. teams on the Texas A&M campus in College Station on Thursday.
snippet: Johnny Manziel put on an impressive performance in front of 75 officials from 30 N.F.L. teams on the Texas A&M campus in College Station on Thursday.
